'''Radiant Spincrystal 28''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Cozy Leisure Time]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located next to cargo boxes besides the staircase at the entrance to the base of [[Wangshu Inn]].
